title: Heart Failure Detection in Electrocardiograms Using Artificial Intelligence
details: A Ranjbar, E Stenhede, J Ravn, H Schirmer - 2025
abstract: The diagnosis of heart failure (HF) is resource-intensive, requiring specialized personnel and equipment, which often leads to severe underdiagnosis. This study proposes the use of a machine learning model to detect HF in Electrocardiograms …
